>> 
>> Is=
 there a problem with having such cycles?
> 
> Glad you asked. Normally I'd=
 say yes - you don't want cycles in an

> 
> Bob=
 Martin has a section in his new book on this subject, which is

thinking about it again. Cycles are to be avoided, and one

oses is to apply a dependency inversion to the code.

To which page in his =

definite no-no, but=
 I don't know what the problem is between classes within
a package.
